forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High near 60F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Thunder possible. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Thunder possible. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning with numerous thunderstorms developing in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning with numerous thunderstorms developing in the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. Thunder possible. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Thunder possible. Low 47F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy late. Low near 10C. Winds SE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. Low 51F. Winds SE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 45F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 12C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 53F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime after midnight. Low 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early with showers developing late. Low 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 52F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 46F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later in the day. High 14C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 57F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 47F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 14C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
